job.title: Senior Data Scientist
job.description: strongThe RolebrbrstrongWpromote is looking for a Senior Data Scientist to join our Product Development team In this role youll partner crossfunctionally with Engineering Product and Reporting Solutions to design machine learning workflows and statistical models that extract key insights from troves of marketing data Your solutions will scale as productized apps used by our industryleading marketers to unlock new performance opportunities for our clients You will have the opportunity to challenge the limits of whats possible with data science and performance marketing designing novel solutions through Computer Vision Time Series Analysis Optimal Experimental Design Recommendations etc using supervised and unsupervised methods including Deep Learning Bayesian Modeling and Graph Neural NetsbrbrstrongYou Will BebrstrongululliWorking closely with Product Management to identify high impact business problems that can be solved by data science and machine learning methodsliliDesigning prototyping building and testingliliDeveloping scalable efficient and automated workflows that can analyze large amounts of data from various sourcesliliIntegrating scalable workflows in production as part of a software engineering teamliliMaintaining data science and machine learning workflows by fixing bugs or improving the model performance if requiredliliArticulating complex technical results and methods to internal stakeholdersliliOccasionally join client meetings to understand client data problems and propose innovative solutionsliliProactively bring issues and problems to the attention of the team and propose and implement innovative solutions to solve thembrbrliululstrongYou Must HavebrstrongululliDegree in Computer Science Engineering Statistics Economics or any related quantitative discipline preferredliliMS 4 years of experience or BS  6 years of relevant experienceliliStrong programming skills in Python amp SQLliliDemonstrable successes in delivering datadriven products including being involved in all aspects of the product development life cycleliliA deep understanding of statistical modeling and machine learning techniquesliliAn understanding of stateoftheart machine learning algorithms and packagesliliStrong working knowledge with large data sets preferably in the digital marketing domain liliExperience with cloud OLAP database platforms such as BigQuery and SnowflakeliliWorking experience in developing and deploying to cloud providers such as AWS and Google Cloud PlatformliliStrong communication skills to both technical and nontechnical audiencesliliAbility to work beyond familiar algorithms  to get out of ones comfort zone and earnestly seek to integrate the best solutions to business challengesliliSincere interest in working towards the datadriven future of digital marketing within a fastgrowing organizationbrbrliululstrongNice To HavebrstrongululliSolid knowledge working with marketing andor user acquisition data across a variety of industriesliliWorking experience with data visualization or BI solutions such as Tableau Looker or Google Data StudioliliWork experience within the digital advertising or MarTech fieldliululliThis position may be performed remotely anywhere within the United States except CO OH HI AK NV WAliliThis position is
